snippet: Novak Djokovic hit some spectacular shots and showed true grit to hold off a Roger Federer fightback as he reached the final of the Australian Open for the fifth time in six years with a 6-1 6-2 3-6 6-3 victory on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic hit some spectacular shots and showed true grit to hold off a Roger Federer fightback as he reached the final of the Australian Open for the fifth time in six years with a 6-1 6-2 3-6 6-3 victory on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Serena Hit New Heights in Melbourne Semis
headline.main: Djokovic, Serena Hit New Heights in Melbourne Semis
